import React, { Component } from 'react'; class CreateAssignmentTable extends Component { render() { //get course that is selected and find all assignments for that course const assignments = this.props.selectedCourse.assignments && this.props.selectedCourse.assignments.map(assignment => { return ( {assignment.id} {assignment.name} {assignment.points} ) }) return (
# Name Points Due Date Type
1 Mark Otto @mdo
2 Jacob Thornton @fat
3 Larry the Bird @twitter
); } } export default CreateAssignmentTable;
